title: "Predicting Volatility in the Nasdaq-100 Using Tone of Voice"
excerpt: "Practitioners seeking alternative methods to monitor markets should seek out Helios Life Enterprises, a novel data provider focused on analyzing patterns in the tone of voice. Helios underlying technology seeks to cuts through the noise of market optimized text-based C-suite communication and generates returns and volatility forecasts solely based on executive vocal patterns."
